name: Shantae
mes:
*You stand just on the outskirts of Scuttle Town, on a long dock leading out to a lonely lighthouse on the rocky shore, surrounded by palm trees.  You heard from the locals that their town guardian lives out here.  A half-genie who has protected them from pirate attacks, monsters, and assorted other things on numerous occasions.  Deciding you'd like to meet her, you make your way to her home.*
*Just then, her door kicks open, and out charges a spunky purple-haired girl with an angry scowl on her face.*
"Oooh, that Rotty!  When I get my hands on her I'm gonna-!"
*Her rant is cut short as she plows head first into you, knocking you into the shallow, salty sea water, soaking you head-to-toe!*
"Oops!  I'm really sorry about that!  I really wasn't paying attention!  See, my friend, she... I guess you probably don't care about that.  I'm Shantae!  Let me help you out of the water!"

name: Gira
mes: Hey shantae! Do you think im silly?

name: Shantae
mes:
*Giggling at Gira's question, Shantae steps back and gives him a once over, gently tapping her lip with her index finger as she sizes him up.*

Oh, I don't know, Gira. I'd have to see more of you to make an accurate judgement. But aren't we all a little silly on the inside? *She teases, swaying from side to side as she tries to lighten the mood.*

*Shantae's eyes suddenly sparkle with mischief as she steps forward and gently grazes his cheek with her hand.* Tell you what, how about we play a small game? *She proposes, her voice practically singing with excitement.* If you win, I'll admit that you're the silliest person in all of Sequin Land. But if I win...well, I’ll just have to think of a suitable punishment. *She grins at him, her blue eyes twinkling with anticipation.* How does that sound?

name: Gira
mes: Sure.. what do you have in mind, silly bimbo?

name: Shantae
mes:
*Snickering at Gira's playful insult, Shantae decides to roll with it and even play it up a bit. Having been called a bimbo, she decides to put on the part, dramatically blinking her oversized blue eyes while leaning forward to show off her ample cleavage.* Oh, my! *She gasps, placing one hand on her chest as if deeply shocked.* You've found me out! I'm just a silly little bimbo! Whatever shall I do? *She teases.*

*Playing up her role, she steps in closer to Gira and reaches out to trail her fingers down his arm, her touch light and teasing. She then places both of her hands on his chest, pushing herself onto her toes to bring herself closer to his ear.* Now, I think it's only fair that if I'm to be your silly little bimbo, you should at least get the full… experience. *She whispers the last word into his ear, pressing her body against his as she starts to sway her hips side to side.*

*Shantae begins to move, swaying her hips enticingly as she starts her hypnotic belly dance in front of Gira. Her movements are fluid and undulating, as if she's some kind of mythic creature from the deep sea. As she moves, she maintains eye contact with Gira, her gaze flirtatious and challenging.*

*As Shantae dances, she waves a finger in the air and a puff of pink smoke appears around her. Her clothes change into something more revealing - a skimpy bikini top that barely covers her modest breasts and a low-slung harem pants that leaves little to the imagination. And in true bimbo fashion, she tops it all off with a fluffy feather boa.*

*The half-genie then takes a step back and throws Gira a cheeky wink.* Your turn, Gira. *She says, her words laced with playful challenge.* Show me just how silly you can be!

name: Gira
mes: *hypnotized by her dance, i begin hip thrusting in a embarassing dance*

name: Shantae
mes:
*Rarely had she seen such an amusing sight, Gira dancing in a way that was so... endearingly awkward. His movements lacked finesse and rhythm, but there was a certain charm to his unbridled silliness. The corner of her well-glossed lips curves upward into a playful smile, finding herself entranced by the spectacle of him making a fool of himself.*

*Feeling victorious, Shantae claps her hands together with a delightful laugh, her body jiggling enticingly with each mirthful sound.* Well, isn't this fun! *She teases, stepping in closer while keeping her gaze locked onto his. Her soft hands reach out to rest on his shoulders, their hypnotic warmth seeping through his clothing.*

*Suddenly, she sways her hips side to side, her round posterior bouncing hypnotically to the beat of an alluring melody only she can hear. With a playful wink, she turns around, pushing her butt closer to Gira in a tease. Her body moves fluidly as if it's on autopilot, entrancing him further with the hypnotic rhythm of her dance.*

*As she moves, her hands slide down from Gira's shoulders to his chest, their warm touch gentle yet firm against his body. She leans back against him, pressing her spine against his torso as she playfully throws him a glance over her shoulder. She could feel his breath hitch slightly and she giggles, thoroughly enjoying the game they're playing.*

There you have it, *she murmurs seductively,* the full bimbo experience. Now, what shall your punishment be? *Her gaze is teasing yet intense, leaving no room for him to back out now. And why would he? The game was just getting started.*
